definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: You don't need me to explain the luck, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 关于幸运之神眷顾，我猜完全用不着解释了。

sentences.english: I can do without your advice, if you don't mind.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不介意，我用不着你的劝告。

sentences.english: There was no use asking him to give any suggestion. he would always brag that there was nothing like leather.
sentences.chinese: 用不着让他提什么建议，他总好王婆卖瓜，自卖自夸。

sentences.english: He's a wealthy guy, doesn't have to steal a Rembrandt.
sentences.chinese: 而且他又有钱，用不着偷伦勃郎的画。

sentences.english: The windows are made of glass and there is no need to use paper or linens anymore.
sentences.chinese: 窗子改成玻璃的，也用不着再糊上纸或纱。

sentences.english: Oh, you contry bumpkin! You don't need it anyway. so don't borther asking.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你这老土，反正你也用不着，就别问了。

sentences.english: I am going home. In the country I am not afraid.
sentences.chinese: 我要回家了，在乡下我用不着害怕。

sentences.english: I did not need an operation. Instead, I did just what the doctor ordered.
sentences.chinese: 我的病用不着手术治疗，而是只需要遵从医嘱。

sentences.english: You can keep that book - I don't need it any more.
sentences.chinese: 那本书你可以留着，我用不着了。

sentences.english: The actor is bidden to undress, and wash off his powder and paint; he will be needed no more.
sentences.chinese: 演员奉命卸装，洗去粉墨胭脂，再也用不着他了。

sentences.english: The world doesn’t need another drama about adultery.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界也用不着戏剧去表演偷鸡摸狗的勾当了。

sentences.english: Don't bother to move I think I can just brush past.
sentences.chinese: 用不着让开，我想我刚好能过得去。

sentences.english: I only feel mild pain. I don't think a pain-killer is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 我只感到有稍微的疼痛，我想用不着吃止痛片。

sentences.english: At this rate, I may not buy another pair of boots.
sentences.chinese: 按照这个穿着频率，我可能根本用不着再买远足靴了。

sentences.english: The Prince of Darkness does not condescend to such cheap drudgery.
sentences.chinese: 这种下贱的差使，根本用不着劳“黑暗之王”的大驾。

sentences.english: Yeah, you probably don't need more than that.
sentences.chinese: 对哦，可能你也用不着那么多车。
